metadata.title: 0.5 Foot RCA Cable Pair - Gotham GAC-4/1 (Black) Star-Quad Audio Interconnect Cable with Amphenol ACPL Black Chrome Body, Gold Plated RCA Connectors - Directional
features: Gotham GAC-4/1, Star-Quad LCOF Copper cable sports extensive shielding (2x100% coverage LCOF Copper shields) , by far the best shielded quad cable in the market . Boasts RF-rejection of over 130dB (25 kHz), & ideal for even very long cable runs.

Gotham AG - Switzerland (est. 1958) is the 1st cabling choice of most Audio Engineers & Manufacturers (e.g.: Neumann Mics). Dubbed 'the most Silent' cables in the industry; exclusively manufactured in Europe using Linear Crystal Oxygen Free (LCOF) Copper.

The brand of connector we used for this custom cable assembly: Amphenol ACPL RCA/Phono plugs with Black chrome body are high-end, professional-grade RCA connectors. Gold plated Brass contacts enhance conductivity. Insulation prevents any shorting inside. Colored rubber flexible grommet grants best strain relief.

All our bespoke cables are professionally soldered using WORLDS BEST CABLES proprietary 4% silver solder blend & a nitrogen-assisted soldering process unique to us, exceeding industry standards, improves integrity of solder joints over traditional methods.

These are custom made cables lovingly assembled by WORLDS BEST CABLES, we offer the largest array of custom built cables in the market, we carry all the major cable and connector brands. We have served millions of customers with quality assemblies for many years - This sale is for a pair of cables, each cable is 0.5 Foot long (2 cables for left and right channels).
description: Custom Made â€“ 0.5 Foot - RCA cable pair made using Gotham GAC-4/1 (Black), Ultra-flexible, Star-Quad, 4-Conductor, Dual-Shielded, Audio Interconnect cable, terminated with Amphenol ACPL - Black Chrome Body, Gold Plated RCA Connectors (Black and Red color boots) (this sale is for a pair of cables for left and right channels, each cable is 0.5 Foot long). IMPORTANT: The Star-Quad design of the cable together with our Directional Topography reduces EMI noises to a point of non-existence (please refer to the images for further technical details).
